## load library
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
getwd()
options(scipen=999)
```


```{r}
microbiome <- readr::read_csv(here("tidy_data", "microbiome.csv"))
```
```{r}
names(microbiome)
```
```{r}
table(microbiome$group)
````


```{r}
microbiome %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = group)) + 
  geom_bar() 
```
```{r}
microbiome %>% 
  select(group, genus) %>% 
  filter(group == "B", abundance > 1000) %>% 
  summarise(genera = n_distinct(genus))
```


```{r}
microbiome %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x =))
```
